Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. This item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $120. I trust this price reflects the true worth of the product while also providing you with an excellent opportunity to acquire it. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
